item.title: 彭博新闻社报道：苹果准备推出配备触摸打孔屏的高端 MacBook Pro
item.description: 据彭博新闻社周四援引知情人士的话报道，苹果公司正准备在 2026 年底或 2027 年初推出重新设计的带触摸显示屏的 MacBook Pro 电脑。【原文：Apple is preparing to launch a redesigned version of its MacBook Pro computer with a touch display for late 2026 or early 2027, Bloomberg News reported on Thursday, citing people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 白宫官员称美国会谈后印度已将俄罗斯石油进口量减少 50
item.description: 一位白宫官员周四告诉路透社，美国和印度已经举行了富有成效的贸易谈判，印度炼油商已经将俄罗斯石油进口量减少了 50%。【原文：The United States and India have held productive trade talks, and Indian refiners are already cutting Russian oil imports by 50%, a White House official told Reuters on Thursday.】

item.title: 摩根大通首席执行官称公司正在考察欧洲和拉丁美洲的银行
item.description: 摩根大通首席执行官杰米-戴蒙（Jamie Dimon）周四表示，这家美国最大的贷款机构正在考察欧洲和拉丁美洲的银行。【原文：JPMorgan Chase CEO Jamie Dimon said on Thursday the largest U.S. lender was looking at banks in Europe and Latin America.】

item.title: 2025 财年美国预算赤字下降 410 亿美元，降至 1.775 万亿美元
item.description: 美国财政部周四报告称，2025 财年美国预算赤字减少了 410 亿美元，降至 1.775 万亿美元，尽管唐纳德-特朗普总统的关税带来了 1,180 亿美元的收入增长。【原文：The U.S. budget deficit shrank by $41 billion to $1.775 trillion in the 2025 fiscal year, despite a $118 billion increase in revenues from President Donald Trump's tariffs, the Treasury Department reported on Thursday.】

item.title: 甲骨文预计30财年云基础设施收入将达1660亿美元
item.description: 甲骨文公司周四表示，预计 2030 财年云基础设施收入将达到 1660 亿美元。【原文：Oracle said on Thursday it expects cloud infrastructure revenue to be $166 billion in fiscal 2030.】

item.title: 解说员：新任首席执行官挥舞斧头，雀巢庞大的食品帝国里有什么？
item.description: 雀巢公司新任首席执行官菲利普-纳夫拉蒂尔（Philipp Navratil）一上任就大刀阔斧地宣布裁员 16000 人，并对产品组合进行审查，可能会出售或合作多个品牌，因为这家全球最大的包装食品公司希望把重点放在快速增长的领域。【原文：Nestle's new CEO Philipp Navratil has started with a bang, announcing 16,000 job cuts and a portfolio review that could see brands sold or partnered off as the world's largest packaged food company looks to focus on fast-growing areas.】

item.title: 罗氏将以 50 美元的价格向支付现金的美国患者出售流感药片
item.description: 罗氏公司周四以50美元的现金折扣价在美国直接面向消费者销售其流感抗病毒药Xofluza，这是继竞争对手采取类似举措后的又一举措，因为它们正努力应对特朗普政府要求降低美国人处方药价格的压力。【原文：Roche on Thursday launched direct-to-consumer U.S. sales of its influenza antiviral pill Xofluza at a discounted cash price of $50, following similar moves by rivals as they scramble to address pressure from the Trump administration to lower prescription drug prices paid by Americans.】

item.title: 雷朋制造商依视路（EssilorLuxottica）因智能眼镜需求 "蓬勃发展 "而实现营收增长
item.description: 雷朋（Ray-Ban）制造商依视路（EssilorLuxottica）周四公布的第三季度营收好于预期，主要得益于可穿戴产品销售的 "蓬勃发展 "以及其最大市场北美市场的稳步增长。【原文：Ray-Ban maker EssilorLuxottica reported better than expected third-quarter revenue on Thursday, boosted by "booming" sales of wearable products and steady growth in North America, its biggest market.】

item.title: EA 最新游戏《战地 6》开售三天销量突破 700 万份
item.description: 电子艺界（Electronic Arts）视频游戏发行商周四表示，《战地6》在发售的前三天创下了专营权销售的历史新高，销量超过700万份。【原文：Electronic Arts' "Battlefield 6" has hit all-time highs for franchise sales during the first three days of its launch, selling over seven million copies, the video game publisher said on Thursday.】

item.title: Apple TV、Peacock 流媒体捆绑包将于下周推出，每月 14.99 美元
item.description: 苹果公司和康卡斯特旗下的 NBC 环球公司周四表示，将于下周推出 Apple TV 和 Peacock Premium 的捆绑流媒体服务，其中包括《泰德-拉索》和《叛徒》等获奖原创节目，月费 14.99 美元。【原文：Apple and Comcast's NBCUniversal will launch a bundle of Apple TV and Peacock Premium streaming services next week, the companies said on Thursday, combining award-winning originals such as "Ted Lasso" and "The Traitors" for $14.99 a month.】

item.title: 投资数十亿美元后，人们对人工智能泡沫看法不一
item.description: 一些公司宣布在人工智能领域投资数十亿美元，这引发了人们对泡沫形成的担忧，让人联想起互联网的繁荣与萧条。【原文：Companies announcing multi-billion dollar investments in artificial intelligence have raised concerns about the formation of a bubble reminiscent of the dotcom boom and bust.】

item.title: 美国证券交易委员会称 "尚不清楚 "拟议的 3 倍和 5 倍杠杆 ETF 是否会获得批准
item.description: 美国证券交易委员会告诉路透社，目前 "尚不清楚 "资产管理公司最近提交的数十份发行高杠杆 ETF 的申请是否会获得该机构的批准。【原文：The U.S. Securities & Exchange Commission told Reuters that it was "unclear" whether the dozens of recent filings by asset managers to issue highly leveraged ETFs would be approved by the agency.】

item.title: 美国立法者称 TikTok 算法的许可协议将引发 "严重关切
item.description: 众议院中国问题特别委员会主席周四表示，作为中国字节跳动公司出售美国短视频应用资产交易的一部分，TikTok 算法的使用许可协议将引发 "严重关切"。【原文：The chair of the House Select Committee on China said Thursday that a licensing agreement for use of the TikTok algorithm as part of a deal by Chinese-based ByteDance to sell U.S. assets of the short video app would raise "serious concerns."】

item.title: 美国地区性银行股受 Zions 冲销和欺诈指控影响
item.description: 美国地区性银行股周四下跌，因为 Zions Bancorporation 披露将在第三季度对其加利福尼亚分部发放的两笔商业和工业贷款进行 5000 万美元的冲销。【原文：U.S. regional bank stocks fell on Thursday after Zions Bancorporation disclosed that it would take a $50 million charge-off in the third quarter on two commercial and industrial loans extended by its California division.】

item.title: 中国称美国限制性措施破坏贸易谈判气氛
item.description: 中国商务部长王文涛表示，9 月马德里会谈后美国推出的 "密集限制措施 "严重损害了中国的利益，破坏了双边贸易磋商的气氛。【原文：China's commerce minister, Wang Wentao, said "intensive U.S. restrictive measures" rolled out after talks in Madrid in September seriously harmed China's interests and undermined the atmosphere for bilateral trade consultations.】

item.title: 酸奶制造商乔巴尼在最新一轮融资中募集 6.5 亿美元
item.description: Chobani 周四表示，该公司在最新一轮融资中筹集了 6.5 亿美元，这家酸奶生产商希望为其在美国的工厂扩张计划提供资金。【原文：Chobani has raised $650 million in its latest funding round, the company said on Thursday, as the yogurt maker looks to fund its plant expansion plans in the United States.】

item.title: ABB 首席执行官对人工智能数据中心的需求充满信心
item.description: 瑞士 ABB 公司首席执行官莫滕-维罗德（Morten Wierod）告诉路透社记者，该公司对为人工智能提供动力的数据中心的未来需求 "非常有信心"。【原文：Switzerland's ABB is "very confident" about future demand from data centers that power artificial intelligence, its CEO Morten Wierod told Reuters.】

item.title: CNN 的全方位订阅层级将于 10 月 28 日推出，每月 6.99 美元
item.description: 美国有线电视新闻网（CNN）将于 10 月 28 日推出每月 6.99 美元的流媒体订阅服务，这是在其母公司华纳兄弟探索公司（Warner Bros Discovery）推出成本高昂的 CNN+ 平台 30 天后的第三年。【原文：CNN is taking another shot at streaming with a $6.99-a-month subscription service that will launch on October 28, three years after its parent Warner Bros Discovery pulled the plug on the costly CNN+ platform within 30 days of debut.】

item.title: 腾讯支持的乌兹别克斯坦初创企业 Uzum 考虑在伦敦上市
item.description: 联合创始人尼古拉-塞列兹涅夫（Nikolay Seleznev）告诉路透社，由腾讯支持的金融科技和电子商务服务提供商、乌兹别克斯坦最有价值的初创公司--乌兹别姆公司（Uzbekum）已将伦敦列入其股票市场上市的可能地点名单。【原文：Tencent-backed fintech and e-commerce provider Uzum, Uzbekistan's most valuable start-up, has added London to its list of possible locations for a stockmarket listing, co-founder Nikolay Seleznev told Reuters.】

item.title: 独家报道美联储主席米兰称在推动降息过程中不关注资产价格上涨
item.description: 美联储理事斯蒂芬-米兰（Stephen Miran）周四表示，他并不担心放宽货币政策会进一步推高历史上、在某些情况下甚至是创纪录的资产价格。【原文：Federal Reserve Governor Stephen Miran on Thursday said he's not concerned that easing monetary policy risks further inflating historically and in some cases record-high asset prices.】

item.title: 美国 10 月住宅建筑商信心指数升至 6 个月新高
item.description: 由于人们希望抵押贷款利率的下降将刺激住房需求，并有助于减少阻碍新住房建设的库存过剩，美国住房建筑商的情绪在 10 月份跃升至六个月来的最高点。【原文：U.S. homebuilder sentiment jumped to a six-month high in October amid hopes that declining mortgage rates would stimulate demand for housing and help reduce an inventory overhang that has hampered new housing construction.】

item.title: EIA 称，到 2029 年，北美的液化天然气出口能力将增加一倍多
item.description: 美国能源信息署（U.S. Energy Information Administration）周四表示，美国的液化天然气出口商已宣布计划将美国的液化能力提高一倍以上，预计到2029年将增加139亿立方英尺/天（Bcf/d）。【原文：Liquefied natural gas exporters in the U.S. have announced plans to more than double U.S. liquefaction capacity, adding an estimated 13.9 billion cubic feet per day (Bcf/d) by 2029, the U.S. Energy Information Administration said on Thursday.】

item.title: 七国集团同意在中国出口管制问题上保持统一战线，实现供应商多元化
item.description: 欧洲经济专员瓦尔蒂斯-东布罗夫斯基斯（Valdis Dombrovskis）周四表示，七国集团财长同意保持统一战线，协调对中国稀土出口管制的短期应对措施，并实现供应商多样化。【原文：Group of Seven finance ministers agreed to keep a united front and coordinate their short-term response to China's export controls on rare earths and to diversify suppliers, European Economic Commissioner Valdis Dombrovskis said on Thursday.】

item.title: 美联储决策者对关税的关注使央行显得政治化：米兰
item.description: 美联储理事斯蒂芬-米兰（Stephen Miran）周四表示，为了维护其极其重要的货币政策独立性，美联储决策者在谈论特朗普政府的政策时必须采取 "要么全盘接受，要么全盘否定 "的态度，这是他对其他决策者担心关税对经济影响的尖锐批评。【原文：To safeguard their critically important monetary policy independence, Federal Reserve policymakers must take an "all-or-nothing" approach to talking about the Trump administration's policies, Fed Governor Stephen Miran said on Thursday, a pointed critique of his fellow policymakers' concern about the impact of tariffs on the economy.】

item.title: 台积电展望人工智能需求强劲，芯片股上涨
item.description: 在本周整个半导体行业数十亿美元的交易中，顶级合约芯片制造商台积电发布了一份乐观的预测，激发了人们对人工智能基础设施需求的乐观情绪，半导体类股周四走高。【原文：Semiconductor stocks advanced on Thursday after top contract chipmaker TSMC issued a rosy forecast, fanning optimism about demand for artificial intelligence infrastructure in a week of multi-billion-dollar deals across the sector.】

item.title: 道明银行聘请业内资深人士担任总法律顾问和财务主管，以加强美国团队的实力
item.description: 多伦多道明银行（Toronto Dominion Bank）周四任命业内资深人士布莱恩-卡莱纳（Brian Callanan）为美国总法律顾问，安德烈-拉莫斯（Andre Ramos）为美国财务主管。【原文：Toronto Dominion Bank on Thursday named industry veterans Brian Callanan as U.S. general counsel and Andre Ramos as U.S. finance head in the Canadian lender's latest push for a stronger footprint south of the border.】

item.title: 英国间谍头目警告人工智能的危险，但并非灾难片中的厄运
item.description: 英国军情五处（MI5）间谍机构负责人周四表示，不受人类控制的人工智能系统有朝一日可能会对安全构成威胁，但他并不是在预测科幻电影中描述的末日场景。【原文：AI systems acting without human control could one day pose a security threat, the head of Britain's MI5 spy agency said on Thursday, although he said he was not predicting doom scenarios as depicted in sci-fi movies.】

item.title: 美国经纪商施瓦布凭借客户资产和交易实力实现创纪录利润
item.description: 美国经纪公司嘉信理财（Charles Schwab）周四公布的第三季度利润超出预期，原因是客户资产创下新纪录，交易收入飙升。【原文：U.S. brokerage firm Charles Schwab beat third-quarter profit expectations on Thursday as client assets hit a new record and trading revenue soared.】

item.title: 国际货币基金组织（IMF）上调亚洲经济增长预期并警告风险
item.description: 国际货币基金组织周四上调了亚洲经济增长预期，但警告称贸易政策不确定性和地缘政治紧张局势将给亚洲经济前景带来风险。【原文：The International Monetary Fund revised up Asia's economic growth forecast on Thursday, but warned of risks to the outlook from trade policy uncertainty and geopolitical tensions.】

item.title: 美国大西洋沿岸中部地区 10 月份制造业收缩；价格措施增加
item.description: 10 月份，美国大西洋中部地区的工厂活动出人意料地萎缩，更多的制造商报告称，他们支付和收到的投入品和货物价格上涨，这表明通胀仍有可能进一步上升。【原文：Factory activity in the U.S. mid-Atlantic region unexpectedly contracted in October, and more manufacturers reported paying and receiving higher prices for inputs and their goods, suggesting inflation could still rise further.】
